README file for osxutils package version 1.6 2004-12-20
osxutils is a package of potentially useful Mac-oriented command-line utilities for Mac OS X version 10.0 or later (although the functionality of some tools may be specific to later versions). These tools represent an effort to bring command-line control over certain aspects of the Mac OS, particularly file meta-data such as Finder flags, heritage file Type and Creator codes, icons, comments, labels, icons, Finder kind strings, and the display of suffixes / file extensions.
I would like to note that these are command-line utilities. They are intended for people who are familiar and comfortable with the command-line interface.
To keep up with the most recent version of osxutils you can visit the SourceForge project website at <http://osxutils.sourceforge.net>.
To see a short example of the uses for these tools you may visit <http://sveinbjorn.vefsyn.is/osxutils_docs>.
For any comments, criticism, feature suggestions and code donations you can email me.
Sveinbjorn Thordarson <sveinbt@hi.is>
